archimate:Requirement.name: TM.1.5.8e: e) liaising with law enforcement bodies and relevant external specialists (e.g. those related to fraud prevention, money laundering prevention and anti-terrorism).
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
